name: TheRamayanQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open the ramayan quiz”
”Alexa, start the ramayan quiz”
”Alexa, launch the ramayan quiz”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ramayan quiz
des: In India, Everyone is watching Ramayan. Ramayan is an Indian television Mythological series, which aired during 1987-1988 on DD National, created, written, and directed by Ramanand Sagar. Ramayan is our most favorite mythological program since childhood. It was a pleasure to watch it again with all the enthusiasm, excitement, and interest. We have not missed watching a single episode since it started. I think you also watching daily. So I thought let create a challenge for all Ramayan lover. Ramayan quiz tests user knowledge about Ramayan. This skill will ask you the simple five questions of Ramayan. The user gets five questions to answer and gets a point for every correct answer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
